name: Red River Ventures
overview:
Red River Ventures was formed in 2000 and invested in 18 different companies across a broad spectrum of industries, including business and consumer services, healthcare, manufacturing and technology. We are currently invested in eight companies.

Red River Ventures is currently fully-invested and is not considering new investment opportunities at this time. However, several of our portfolio companies are seeking to acquire companies which are complementary to their businesses.

Bruce Duty, the managing general partner, is endeavoring to create value in the existing portfolio companies by working in close partnership with the management teams of those companies. In addition, Bruce Duty is seeking to invest personal funds in attractive growth businesses.
